process.title: Problem Framing
process.description: We work with your team to define business objectives, constraints, and success criteria. No quantum jargon — just clear problem definition.

process.title: Data Readiness
process.description: We assess and prepare relevant datasets, ensuring data quality and format requirements are met for quantum and classical experiments.

process.title: Classical Baseline
process.description: Before testing quantum approaches, we establish performance benchmarks using state-of-the-art classical methods. This is how we measure real value.

process.title: Quantum / Hybrid Experiments
process.description: We design and execute quantum-inspired pilots, testing multiple approaches and documenting what works and what doesn't.

process.title: Business Outcome Review
process.description: We analyze results honestly, review business impact, and recommend clear next steps — whether that's scaling, waiting, or pivoting.
